knimeNode.name: Database Apply-Binner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node allows to group numeric data in intervals - called bins.

intro.p: This node allows to group numeric data in intervals - called bins. The bins are defined in the PMML Model.
This node is typically used when test data shall be binned the same way the training data has been binned (using the "Database Auto-Binner or Database Numeric-Binner" node).

ports.inPort: The PMML Model fragment containing information how to bin
